description:
Sketchy types are just as happy to nick nice wheels or saddles off your ride as to steal the bike itself. Make them move on to easier pickings with these locking skewers and seat collar bolt. All three tighten or loosen only with the unique proprietary circular key, which comes in 11,200 combinations.

  • Wheel skewers and collar bolt are long enough to fit most bicycles and can be shortened with a hacksaw, or angle grinder
  • Lifetime key replacement
name: Pinhead Wheels/Seat Post Lock (3 Pack)
